section.section: Each member of the Commission shall devote full time to the duties of office.

While on the Commission, a member may not:
practice law;
hold any political employment under State or federal law; or
hold any other position or engage in any business that interferes or is inconsistent with any duty of office.

Each member of the Commission is entitled to:
the salary provided in the State budget; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

The annual salary of a member of the Commission:
shall at least equal the salary provided in the State budget for a judge of the district court; and
for the Chairman, shall be at least $1,500 more than the salary of the other members.
Except as provided in paragraphs (1) and (2) of this subsection, a member of the Commission may not receive a fee or perquisite for the discharge of any duty of office.
